text:
Hey everyone,

I'm currently going through the HubSpot CMS for Developers Practicum and trying to complete the 2nd requirement involving creating an image module and a rich text module next to one another in a template.

I followed along with the instructional video and looked into some documentation and I've been stuck on this for about 2 hours.  Any help would be greatly appreciated.

I've attached the code in my page.html template below.

Right now, I'd expect for this to output an image module and a rich text module next to one another on the page as it does in the relevant instructional video.  It does not.  Instead, what I see is in the second screenshot below.  Two areas that say "drop modules here" rendered one on top of the other.

I watched the video on preparing for the practicum and so I know that not properly including the _layout.css from the boilerplate theme to handle the 12 column grid can mess people up.  That is all handled as far as I know.  I have it included into my main.css which is required in my base.html which my page.html template extends.

Please any help here would be appreciated.  I'm at a loss as to what could be going wrong.
